channel.title: Is this right?
channel.description:
[code=abap]Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7600] Copyright (c) 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
C:\Users\Brogan>javac 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Users\Brogan>java c Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: c Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: c at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: c. Program will exit.
C:\Users\Brogan>[/code]
And this is my compiler:
[code=javascript]@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_20/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause [/code]
but i get this as a result when trying to compile
[code=java]The system cannon find the path specified press any button to continue...[/code]
I really am starting to give up im new to this, and i really need info if anyones got teamviewer and think they can fine the solution feel free to ask for my id and pass, the problem is i never know if it's anti-leeched or whether im going wrong somewhere?... HELP!!!!

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @DbowRushedDdsDone DbowRushedDdsDone
item.description:
@DbowRushedDdsDone wrote:

And this is my compiler:

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_20/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

but i get this as a result when trying to compile

The system cannon find the path specified press any button to continue...

The correction for the compiler is the / they should be \ so it’s C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\Bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java
pause

Or for yours it would be C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe -d ./bin ./src/*.java

                                                                        Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Your paths aren’t set correctly.

Read full topic

Update your java.

item.description:
@warouxriot wrote:

[code=abap]Microsoft Windows [Version 6.1.7600]
Copyright © 2009 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\Users\Brogan>javac
‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Users\Brogan>java c
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: c
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: c
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: c. Program will exit.

C:\Users\Brogan>[/code]

And this is my compiler:

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_20/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

but i get this as a result when trying to compile

The system cannon find the path specified press any button to continue...

I really am starting to give up im new to this, and i really need info if anyones got teamviewer and think they can fine the solution feel free to ask for my id and pass, the problem is i never know if it’s anti-leeched or whether im going wrong somewhere?.. HELP!!!
